affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
notes:
If the target is killed within 2 seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.
Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.
cmb:
120/120/120/120
10
lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
name: broodmother_spawn_spiderlings

desc: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 40 seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for 6 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
notes:
Has a fade time of 2 seconds.
Also affects Spiderling and Spiderites.
If free movement is disabled, you will destroy nearby trees.
attrib:
MAX WEBS: 2/4/6/8
HEALTH REGEN: 2/4/6/8
MOVE INCREASE: 40%/50%/60%/70%
MAX WEB CHARGES: 1/2/3/4
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 40
cmb:
50
0
lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
name: broodmother_spin_web

desc: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
notes: The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.
lore: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
name: broodmother_incapacitating_bite

desc: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
notes:
Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.
Insatiable hunger can be removed by purge effects.
cmb:
100/100/100
45
lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
name: broodmother_insatiable_hunger
